data.title: Turkish Economic Review
meta_keywords: Asymmetry; long memory; multifractality Omori Law; Stylized facts; Volatility.
data.meta_description: Volatility stylized facts in the Moroccan stock market: Evidence from both aggregate and disaggregate data
